text: but seriously, it seems like it's easy to work with HubDB data as an endpoint but field.json is lacking

Kind of a small thing but when you are in the theme editor and publish changes can it be set to not automatically redirect you back to the “Choose a theme” page of settings? But instead can it just keep you in the Theme settings that you were already in? I find that myself and clients often make edits to it bit by bit as they build out pages/the site and needing to click back into the theme we want to edit is a bit of a nuisance.
What beef do you have with fields.json <@UDHT6N5SM>?
Perhaps its as simple as what you have on the page editor. This option would be great!
